recipesJson.name: mlNikon's Cherry Cupcake
recipesJson.author: mixinvixens
recipesJson.description: This is a vanilla cupcake with cherry buttercream frosting. The forest fruit and boysenberry add some much needed body and darkness to inw cherries and takes away some of these dreaded cherry off notes. I totally stole this trick from the mixing godfather himself Addy Tuney.
